    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>

        <api_name>global.PmConsoleUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Utilities for working with pm_console table

Usage: 
var pmConsoleUtil = new PmConsoleUtil(sys_class_name);
pmConsoleUtil.<utility></description>
        <name>PmConsoleUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PmConsoleUtil = Class.create();
PmConsoleUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function(tableName) {
        this.tableName = tableName;
    },
	
	isConsoleExist: function(entity, context) {
		var consoleExist = false;
		var consoles = 0;		
		var count = new GlideAggregate(this.tableName);
		count.addQuery('entity', '=', entity);
		count.addQuery('context', '=', context);
		count.addAggregate('COUNT');
		count.query();
		if(count.next())  
		   consoles = count.getAggregate('COUNT');

		if(consoles > 0)
			consoleExist = true;
		
		return consoleExist;
	},
	
    type: 'PmConsoleUtil'
};]]></script>
